title: login
body: I was having a problem logging in so i just re-downloaded the game for easy fix instead of waiting for you guys to fix the bug. and it worked but i cant log into my old account now. and every time I use username recover it wont send it to the email address.... so if you could email me username so i can make sure i am entering it right or can send me a link or some thing to recover my account. Got a lot of money invested into it and I dont wanna take that loss.

replies.body:
We can help you recover your account if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will be happy to work with you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
